users.author: Kaveh Solhekol
users.title: Kylian Mbappe is prepared
users.content: Mbappe is prepared to let his PSG contract run down for Real Madrid switch; Mbappe's current deal expires in 2024 and PSG say he must extend or be sold this summer; PSG have left Mbappe off their pre-season tour to train at their Paris base; Saudi club Al Hilal among interested clubs
